notes.content: Created comprehensive build.md in a single pass rather than incremental tasks. All workflow phases, agent prompt template, user outputs, and error handling included in initial creation for coherence.
Rewrote OVERVIEW.md entirely rather than incremental edits. Added DevNotes section, checkpoint agent documentation, updated command syntax with positional args, and updated workflow diagram.
Successfully used the session itself to verify state tracking works. plan_state correctly tracked checkpoints_completed array and summary updates throughout the build.
